name: Darks Mirrors
description:
The game about mirrors is a prototype.

Version 0.3.3

The game has -

Three monsters - Swamp creature and demon rabbit. And the last demon of Darkness.

Mini-games - if you get caught, it's not over - play mini-games with them and save lives

Watch the light, if it goes out, the demon of darkness will come, you will not run away from it.

One-click management.

I regenerate light while you rest.

Swamp monster is very slow - And the demon rabbit does not attack while you stand.

A surviving friend.

while playing, the screen may turn red, which means that you have lost control.
